message: Let's start fair. I'll take the bigger share, but I'm willing to negotiate if you think it's unfair.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. We can both walk away happy.
I understand you want to be fair, but I'm still the one losing value with each round.  Let's split it 60/40 this time, and we can work towards a more even split later.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 45/55 this time, and see if we can work towards a more even split in the future.
